alert.note: Alert for Duval; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:03AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Duval and eastern Webb Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 402 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Fort Ewell Site to 16 miles east of Ranchitos Las Lomas to 7 miles south of Aguilares to 6 miles east of San Ygnacio. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Freer, Benavides, Rio Bravo, El Cenizo, Mirando City, Oilton, Ramirez, San Jose, Aguilares, Concepcion, Realitos, Ranchitos Las Lomas, Bruni, Cruz Calle, Rios and Rosita. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 760 and 816. US Highway 83 between mile markers 728 and 734. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
